ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pet commands
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The point is to put space between you and the mob so it isn t beating on you the entire trip to the zone.  Invis just insures any extra mobs I run past
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 29 Mar 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
> >
> >I use /pet guard here for escape purposes when Screech is not
> >suitable. I charm the mob, have the pet guard, fire up invis,
> >and run for the zone.
>
> Since invis breaks charm, wouldn't this be sort of pointless?

The point is to put space between you and the mob so it isn't
beating on you the entire trip to the zone. Invis just
insures any extra mobs I run past won't immediately latch on
to me.

Oh, wait I see what you're saying. No, you don't stand next
to the charmed mob waiting for the invis to take effect. :)
You equip the flute, start the song, and immediately begin to
run.

The other option is to chain the mob that's chasing you.
Charm however can usually tie up 2-3 mobs while you get away.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
